channel.title: Example on Dark Kernel
channel.description: Recent content in Example on Dark Kernel

item.title: Set input devices permissions while starting Display server.
Cava mic source input
item.description:
Add below section in cava config

get the source ID:

pactl list sources

[–more–]

[input]
method = pulse
source = 55  # source id

item.title: Made for people
item.description: Datenstrom Yellow is for people who make small websites. Installing is unzipping one file and you are ready to go. The most important things for small websites are included. You can add features, languages and themes. Datenstrom Yellow works as content management system and static site generator.
